name: PCKG_INV
body_snippet:
package body pckg_inv is

  -- INITIALIZED IN PACKAGE INITIALIZER
  LNUM_CLIENT_ID NUMBER(14);
  -------------------------------------

  --- GLOBAL VARIABLES FOR CACHE PROCEDURE
  LGNUM_CACH_SINV_ID        NUMBER(14);
  LGNUM_CACH_ORG_ID         NUMBER(14);
  LGNUM_CACH_SET_OF_BOOK_ID NUMBER(14);
  LGNUM_CACH_DATE           DATE;

  LGNUM_PREV_YEARS_ID         NUMBER(14);
  LGNUM_THIS_YEARS_FIRST_DATE DATE;
  ----------------------------------------

  PROCEDURE get_balance_qty_amount(parm_last_years_id      NUMBER,
                                   parm_start_date         DATE,
                                   parm_inv_org            NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
                                   parm_sub_inv_id         NUMBER,
                                   parm_loc_code_id        NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
                                   parm_item_id            NUMBER,
                                   parm_date               DATE,
                                   parm_inv_transaction_no NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
                                   parm_det_srno           number default null,
                                   parm_amount             OUT NUMBER,
                                   parm_pri_qty            OUT NUMBER,
                                   parm_sec_qty            OUT NUMBER);

  procedure update_item_value(parm_change_date        DATE,
                              parm_inv_transaction_no NUMBER,
                              parm_item_id            NU
